ratings.comment: Unable to understand. His English is virtually unintelligible.

Though he seems like a nice guy, attending his lectures won't help or hurt your grade in the class. Unless your somehow able to understand him. Having a good TA who does review sessions is the most helpful part of the class. If Beth M is a TA, TAKE HER and you might learn something.

The worst professor. Doesn't speak any english and just smiles if you ask questions. Lectures are useless. Must read book and good TA. Can honestly say I have no idea how to apply anything I learned in this class to the real world. Horrible grading system. Exams are out of 20 points so you cannot afford to miss any problems. Don't take this class.

Absolutely terrible professor. Cannot understand anything he is saying. Lectures are just problems from the book. He is terrible at explaining things and always skips steps in his work in lecture. I learned more from my TA and the kid I sat next to than this terrible professor.
Hard to understand, all depends on your TA (like a lot of math classes here). Be prepared to teach yourself and get help outside the classroom

Did a good job for this difficult class.  First and second exams were fairly easy with 3 or 4 problems out of 5 being right off the homework.  The final was much, much ore difficult.  Overall, good professor.

Professor Qiu's lectures were based almost entirely off of the book except they were more confusing because no one could understand him.  Asking a question in class is useless because he can't comprehend what you're asking.  Class was super easy though.  Mostly manipulating matrices.  Stuff you learned in 7th grade.  Tests and h/w were a breeze.

Yannan is a very interesting professor. He speaks barely any english and nobody can understand him. Lecture is more of an entertainment show than a math lecture. YOU DO NOT EVER NEED TO GO TO CLASS. Get a good tutor and hopefully your TA will be good enough. exams were all very do-able, mostly based on HW problems and similar to practice tests.

Tests are pretty easy.  First one half the class got a perfect score.  Lectures are pretty much pointless, and very boring.  He isn't really in touch with his students.  (I wonder if he noticed only 1/3 of the class showed up).  Get a good TA and should be no problem.

Just awful- he takes all of his examples straight out of the book, and you can barely understand what he is saying- attendance is completely useless- simply read the book- all of his tests are really based off of hw-usually laughs at you if you ask him questions- his answers barely make any sense anyway- would recommend seeing who else is out there
Lecture = no point in going, what he writes on the board is just like what is in the book (except it is spelled wrong). Exams are easy - on the first exam over half of the class got A's.
Absolutely terrible; stay away from this guy.
He cant speak english, so i have no idea what he ever says. At all costs do not take this class  or any class with him.

Useless. Better off going through the book by yourself because you can't really understand what he is saying. Doesn't know how to explain something when someone asks a question - he just laughs. How does this university allow professors like this to continue teaching? Unbelievable. Stay away from this prof.
